introduction: SYNOPSISTwo brothers, Hyuk and Bin, live in a small coal mining village. Hyuk, the younger of the two, works hard as a coal miner to make ends meet. On the other hand, Bin becomes a slave to gambling and leads a wretched life. Bin soon becomes a casualty of a greedy gangster named Gang-ho who wants to reshape the mine for profit-making facilities. Hyuk enters the world of underground fight ring to avenge the wrongful death of his brother.故事村里有两个年轻人正在被放弃。李小姐正在作为矿工努力工作，但有一天他一直在赌博。与此同时，试图将整个矿井转化为商业用途的康和荣似乎出现了，而归结于其中的吉斌，兄弟会复仇
